articles.title: ESA actively monitoring near-Earth asteroid 2024 YR4 - European Space Agency
articles.description: The European Space Agency (ESA) Planetary Defence Office is closely monitoring the recently discovered asteroid 2024 YR4, which has a very small chance of impacting Earth in 2032. This page was last updated on 29 January 2025.
articles.content:
